member.name: T:Normalization.NormalizationOperations
member.summary: The NormalizationOperations class. Containes all methods necessary to store the current weather information that we download from the Weather API (openweathermap.org).

member.name: M:Normalization.NormalizationOperations.NormalizeTemperature(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts temperature from kelvin to celsius.
member.param: Double temperature value in kelvin degrees.

member.name: M:Normalization.NormalizationOperations.NormalizeDate(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts time from seconds from 1.1.1970 to DateTime format and then to string.
